Title: Establishes the Thomas A. Constantine Institute for the study of transnational organized crime within the state university of New York; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the Thomas A. Constantine institute for the study of transnational organized crime within the state university of New York; makes an appropriation therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing the Thomas A. Constantine Institute for the study of transnational organized crime within the state university of New York and making an appropriation therefor
